name: Brownie's Nightmare
description:
Brownie keeps having reoccurring nightmares night after night but doesn't know why. Help him discover the reason and free him from his nightmare.

A precision, action, adventure, platformer that is casual and fun. This was a fan-game created for Browniesauce Gaming on YouTube. It was made in 1 week so there may still be little quirks. I hope you enjoy.

Controls: WASD or ARROW KEYS, SPACEBAR
